subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Russell Baze will enter Thursday's program at Bay Meadows with 9,523 career victories, only seven shy of the career leader Laffit Pincay Jr.
snippet: Russell Baze will enter Thursday's program at Bay Meadows with 9,523 career victories, only seven shy of the career leader Laffit Pincay Jr.
